=======
CHANGES
=======

3.0.0 (2017-01-11)
------------------

- feature: added level 2 test using mongodb stub server and use the fake mongodb
  setup for default test runner

- support pymongo >= 3.0.0 and use 3.0.0 as package version and reflect
  pymongo >= 3.0.0 compatibility


0.5.0 (2013-06-28)
------------------

- initial release
